tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_health_data
(
    drone_id INT,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    health_status VARCHAR(20),
    health_score FLOAT,
    capture_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (drone_id, capture_date)
);

CREATE TABLE drone_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  crop_id INT,
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  flight_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES drone_info(drone_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crop_health_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE DroneData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id VARCHAR(50),
    drone_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    captured_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FieldData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    area FLOAT,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CropHealthData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
